Title: Il segno di Venere
Writer: Edoardo Anton (story), Luigi Comencini (story), Franca Valeri (story), Edoardo Anton (screenplay), Ennio Flaiano (screenplay), Franca Valeri (screenplay), Dino Risi (screenplay), Cesare Zavattini (scenario collaborator)
Actors: Sophia Loren, Franca Valeri, Vittorio De Sica, Raf Vallone
Plot: Agnese has many men who woo her and live with her cousin Cesira Franca Valeri, who has the opposite problem with men and wishes she would also have men woo her.
